item.title: Setting up redis and nat-connector with FaasD
item.description: Lets look at how we expand our faasd server to include a couple of services. We'll first add a redis server and some simple ruby code to add a counter, and then we'll build and add the nats-connector to be able publish and subscribe to events. About /var/lib/faasd/docker-compose.yaml This looks like a docker-compose file, and I believe that it actually does use the same code that parses the file of that name, but it doesn't use docker to set up the containers.
